original: @102b rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @102b rgya gar skad du /

analyzed: a'arya shr'i ma h'a de bi by'a ka ra na /

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /

original: 'phags pa lha mo chen mo dpal lung bstan pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa lha mo chen mo dpal lung bstan pa /
translated: The Prophecy of the Great Goddess Śrī

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to all the buddhas and bodhisattvas.

original: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig ni /🔽bcom ldan 'das bde ba can na byang chub sems @103a *//
analyzed: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig ni / bcom ldan 'das bde ba can na byang chub sems @103a *//
translated: Thus have I heard at one time.

original: dpa'i dge 'dun chen po 'di lta ste /
analyzed: dpa'i dge 'dun chen po 'di lta ste /
translated: The Blessed One was in Sukhāvatī with a great saṅgha of bodhisattvas, namely:

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po dang /
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva Avalokiteśvara, the bodhisattva mahāsattva Mahāsthāmaprāpta, the bodhisattva mahāsattva Sarva­nīvaraṇa­viṣkambhin, the bodhisattva mahāsattva Kṣitigarbha,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jigs pa thams cad sel ba dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jigs pa thams cad sel ba dang /
translated: the bodhisattva mahāsattva Samantabhadra, the bodhisattva mahāsattva Ākāśagarbha, the bodhisattva mahāsattva Vajrapāṇi, the bodhisattva mahāsattva Sarvaduḥkha-cchedana,🔽and likewise the bodhisattva mahāsattva Sarvaśodhana-maṅgala-dhara, the bodhisattva mahāsattva Sarvapuṇya-lakṣaṇa-dhara, the bodhisattva mahāsattva Candra-sūrya,

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byed kyi bkra shis thams cad 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams kyi mtshan thams cad 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi zla dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byed kyi bkra shis thams cad 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams kyi mtshan thams cad 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi zla dang /

original: 'jig rten 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mu stegs kyi bkra shis thams cad 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / de la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams @103b cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so //
analyzed: 'jig rten 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mu stegs kyi bkra shis thams cad 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / de la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams @103b cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so //
translated: Lokadhara, the bodhisattva mahāsattva Tiṣya, the bodhisattva mahāsattva Mañjuśrī Kumārabhūta, and so forth—all the bodhisattva mahāsattvas of the fortunate eon were present.

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
translated: Then the bodhisattva mahāsattva Avalokiteśvara went to where the Blessed One was, and having arrived, he bowed his head at the feet of the Blessed One and sat to one side.

original: lha mo chen po dpal yang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bde ba can na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la yang
analyzed: lha mo chen po dpal yang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bde ba can na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la yang
translated: bowed her head to the bodhisattva mahāsattvas dwelling in Sukhāvatī.

original: mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go //
analyzed: mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go //
translated: Then she sat to one side.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams brgya stong du mas brgyan cing /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams brgya stong du mas brgyan cing /
translated: Then the Blessed One, adorned with many hundreds of thousands of merits,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba dag gis yongs su bskor te brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba dag gis yongs su bskor te brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags so //
translated: surrounded by ten million tathāgatas, was praised and extolled by all Śakras, Brahmās, and Lokapālas.

original: lha mo chen mo dpal la gzigs nas tshangs pa chen po'i gsung gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: lha mo chen mo dpal la gzigs nas tshangs pa chen po'i gsung gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: Looking at the great goddess Śrī, he spoke with the voice of Mahābrahmā to the bodhisattva mahāsattva Avalokiteśvara:

original: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /
analyzed: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /

original: rgyal po'am / blon po'am /
analyzed: rgyal po'am / blon po'am /
translated: whether a king, a minister,🔽a monk,

original: dge slong ngam /🔽dge slong ma'am /
analyzed: dge slong ngam / dge slong ma'am /

original: dge bsnyen nam /
analyzed: dge bsnyen nam /

original: dge bsnyen ma'am /
analyzed: dge bsnyen ma'am /

original: bram ze'am / rgyal rigs sam /
analyzed: bram ze'am / rgyal rigs sam /

original: rje'u rigs sam /🔽dmangs rigs gang la la lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming brgya @104a *//
analyzed: rje'u rigs sam / dmangs rigs gang la la lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming brgya @104a *//

original: rtsa brgyad dri ma med par grags pa zhes bya ba'i bstod pa 'di 'chang na /
analyzed: rtsa brgyad dri ma med par grags pa zhes bya ba'i bstod pa 'di 'chang na /
translated: if any of them were to possess this praise of the one with the stainless fame of the one hundred and eight names of the glorious goddess,

original: rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po de'i yul dang / sems can de dag gi 'jigs pa dang / yams kyi nad gnod pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur zhing chom rkun dang / g-yo can dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po de'i yul dang / sems can de dag gi 'jigs pa dang / yams kyi nad gnod pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur zhing chom rkun dang / g-yo can dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: then all the fears and dangers of that kṣatriya king’s country and those beings would be pacified, and all the dangers from thieves, rogues, humans, and non-humans would not occur.

original: nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba thams cad rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba thams cad rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: All his wealth, grain, treasuries, and granaries would increase.

original: rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po de'i khyim du yang dpal nges par gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po de'i khyim du yang dpal nges par gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: And glory would definitely remain in the home of that kṣatriya king.

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis tshig 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis tshig 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then those bodhisattva mahāsattvas said these words:

original: bcom ldan 'das //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das //

original: gsung 'di legs par bka' stsal pa legs so legs so //
analyzed: gsung 'di legs par bka' stsal pa legs so legs so //
translated: excellent, excellent it is well spoken!

original: legs te / gang dag lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming rnams 'dzin pa dang / thos nas kyang sgrub par bgyid pa de dag gi yon tan dang / pan yon ni //
analyzed: legs te / gang dag lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming rnams 'dzin pa dang / thos nas kyang sgrub par bgyid pa de dag gi yon tan dang / pan yon ni //
translated: Those who uphold the names of the great goddess Śrī and, having heard them, practice them, their qualities and benefits

original: de dag lags so //
analyzed: de dag lags so //

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the bodhisattva mahāsattva Ārya Avalokiteśvara said this to the Blessed One:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

original: lha mo dpal gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang du bskyed pa lags /
analyzed: lha mo dpal gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang du bskyed pa lags /
translated: where did the goddess Śrī plant her roots of virtue?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

original: lha mo chen mo dpal gyis de bzhin gshegs @104b pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de /
analyzed: lha mo chen mo dpal gyis de bzhin gshegs @104b pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de /
translated: “The great goddess Śrī planted roots of virtue with tathāgatas as numerous as the sands of the Ganges River.

original: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /
analyzed: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /

original: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che las byung ba zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i me tog yon tan gyi rgya mtsho bee d'urya dang / gser gyi ri bo mdog mdzes gser 'od dpal zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
analyzed: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che las byung ba zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i me tog yon tan gyi rgya mtsho bee d'urya dang / gser gyi ri bo mdog mdzes gser 'od dpal zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
translated: In the past, in the world system called Jewel Origin, the thus-gone Jewel Flower Ocean of Qualities, the beryl and beautiful golden-hued Glorious Light of the Mountain, appeared in the world.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mang po gzhan dag la yang lha mo chen mo dpal gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mang po gzhan dag la yang lha mo chen mo dpal gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed do //
translated: The great goddess Śrī also planted roots of virtue with many other thus-gone ones.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag kyang lha mo chen mo dpal de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel ba dang / 'grub par byed pa dang / rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag kyang lha mo chen mo dpal de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel ba dang / 'grub par byed pa dang / rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba yin te /
translated: These names of the thus-gone ones increase the great goddess Śrī’s roots of virtue, bring them to completion, and always follow her.

original: de dag ni /
analyzed: de dag ni /

original: 'dir lha mo dpal yang dag par brjod pa dang / sdig pa thams cad sel ba dang / nyes sdig thams cad med par byed pa dang / lus thams cad dri ma med par byed pa dang / nor dang / 'bru rnams 'du zhing 'phel bar byed pa dang /
analyzed: 'dir lha mo dpal yang dag par brjod pa dang / sdig pa thams cad sel ba dang / nyes sdig thams cad med par byed pa dang / lus thams cad dri ma med par byed pa dang / nor dang / 'bru rnams 'du zhing 'phel bar byed pa dang /
translated: Here, the goddess is called Śrī Samantabhadrī, the remover of all evil, the eradicator of all faults and sins, the purifier of all bodies,🔽the one who brings wealth and grain,

original: dbul ba gcod par byed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad 'dun par byed cing 'gugs par byed pa dang /
analyzed: dbul ba gcod par byed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad 'dun par byed cing 'gugs par byed pa dang /
translated: the one who cuts off poverty, the one who attracts and summons all gods, nāgas, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kinnaras, and mahoragas,

original: yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'thab pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / rtsod pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgrub par @105a *//
analyzed: yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'thab pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / rtsod pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgrub par @105a *//
translated: the one who pacifies all epidemics, harms, quarrels, disputes, and conflicts, and the one who accomplishes the six perfections.

original: byed pa'o // 'di lta ste /
analyzed: byed pa'o // 'di lta ste /

original: de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi sgron ma'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i snying po las byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi sgron ma'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo // de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i snying po las byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathāgata Gandhapradīpaśrī.🔽Homage to the Tathāgata Sāgaragarbhavṛṣabhaprabhāsaśrī.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa sprul pa'i 'brug sgra snyan pa'i dpal la phyag @106a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa sprul pa'i 'brug sgra snyan pa'i dpal la phyag @106a *//

original: 'tshal lo // de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi snang ba thams cad bkod pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa shing gi rgyal po ltar skyes pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'tshal lo // de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi snang ba thams cad bkod pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo // de bzhin gshegs pa shing gi rgyal po ltar skyes pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathāgata Sarvadharmapradīpanirghoṣaśrī.🔽Homage to the Tathāgata Drumaketudhvajaśrī.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro ri bo'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro ri bo'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od 'phro rgya mtsho'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam chen po'i shugs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od 'phro rgya mtsho'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo // de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam chen po'i shugs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathāgata Jñānaketu-sāgaravaralokiteśvara.🔽Homage to the Tathāgata Mahāpraṇidhānasāgarāvalanakaraprabhaśrī.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dran pa'i tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dran pa'i tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: de bzhin gshegs pa nor dang 'bru thams cad sdud pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba 'dren pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa nor dang 'bru thams cad sdud pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo // de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba 'dren pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Tathāgata Sarvārthasambhavaśrī.🔽Homage to the Tathāgata Śāntinandinīśrī.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa phun sum tshogs pa 'gugs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa phun sum tshogs pa 'gugs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag rim gror byas te bcang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag rim gror byas te bcang bar bya'o //
translated: These names of the Tathāgatas should be honored and upheld.

original: bklag par bya'o //
analyzed: bklag par bya'o //

original: de ltar byas na /
analyzed: de ltar byas na /

original: rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am /

original: rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams shin tu mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams shin tu mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: or that daughter of good family will generate a great deal of merit.

original: lha mo chen mo dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan te /
analyzed: lha mo chen mo dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan te /
translated: The great goddess Śrī was prophesied by all the Tathāgatas:

original: lha mo chen mo dpal khyod ma @106b 'ongs pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams dpal chen po rin po ches brgyan pa zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal nor bu rin po che las byung ba zhes🔽bya bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: lha mo chen mo dpal khyod ma @106b 'ongs pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams dpal chen po rin po ches brgyan pa zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal nor bu rin po che las byung ba zhes bya bar 'gyur te /
translated: Great Goddess Śrī, in the future you will become the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Enlightened One named Śrī-maṇiratna-saṃbhava in the world system called Mahāśrī-ratna-vyūha.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams de yang lha'i rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams de yang lha'i rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan par 'gyur ro //
translated: That world system will be adorned with various divine jewels.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid snang bar mdzad par 'gyur la /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid snang bar mdzad par 'gyur la /
translated: In that world system, that Tathāgata himself will shine,

original: 'jig rten gyi khams de na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang rang las 'od 'byung zhing tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams de na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang rang las 'od 'byung zhing tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro //
translated: and the bodhisattvas dwelling in that world system will have light emanating from themselves and will have immeasurable lifespans.

original: nam mkha' las kyang sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nam mkha' las kyang sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The sounds of the Buddha, Dharma, and Saṅgha will emerge from the sky.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa' gang dag skye bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang padma'i snying po dag las skye bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa' gang dag skye bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang padma'i snying po dag las skye bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to //
translated: And he prophesied that all the bodhisattvas who will be born in that buddha-field will be born from the heart of a lotus.

original: de la ming brgya rtsa brgyad dri ma med pa lta bu zhes bya ba'i bstod pa rgyun chags bcu gnyis gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la ming brgya rtsa brgyad dri ma med pa lta bu zhes bya ba'i bstod pa rgyun chags bcu gnyis gang zhe na /
translated: What are the twelve continuous praises called the Stainless One’s Hundred and Eight Names?

original: bishnu ye sv'a h'a /🔽ru dr'a ya sv'a h'a /🔽bi shva mu kh'a ya sv'a h'a /🔽aom gri ni gri na sarba k'arya s'a dha ni /🔽si ni si ni /🔽a'a b'a h'a /🔽de ba h'a /🔽bee shra ma n'a ya sv'a h'a /🔽su barna / dha na dhya n+ya /🔽a'a karsha n+yee sv'a h'a /🔽sarba pu n+yee sv'a h'a /🔽shr'i he ba te a'a karsha n+yee sv'a h'a /🔽sarba p'a pam na sha myee sv'a h'a /🔽sarba aa lakshmi pra sha ma n+yee sv'a h'a /🔽sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka ye sv'a h'a /🔽sarba de ba ta aa bhi mu kha shri ye aa yur ba la parna ke ra ye sv'a h'a /
analyzed: bishnu ye sv'a h'a / ru dr'a ya sv'a h'a / bi shva mu kh'a ya sv'a h'a / aom gri ni gri na sarba k'arya s'a dha ni / si ni si ni / a'a b'a h'a / de ba h'a / bee shra ma n'a ya sv'a h'a / su barna / dha na dhya n+ya / a'a karsha n+yee sv'a h'a / sarba pu n+yee sv'a h'a / shr'i he ba te a'a karsha n+yee sv'a h'a / sarba p'a pam na sha myee sv'a h'a / sarba aa lakshmi pra sha ma n+yee sv'a h'a / sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka ye sv'a h'a / sarba de ba ta aa bhi mu kha shri ye aa yur ba la parna ke ra ye sv'a h'a /
translated: Vishnuyai svaha.🔽Rudraya svaha.🔽Vishvamukhaya svaha.🔽Om grini grini sarvakarya sadhani.🔽Sinini sinini.🔽Avaha.🔽Devaha.🔽Veshramanaya svaha.🔽Subarndha dhanadhanyaya.🔽Akarshanye svaha.🔽Sarvapunyaye svaha.🔽Shri hevate akarshanye svaha.🔽Sarva papam nashayeye svaha.🔽Sarva alkshmi prashamanyeye svaha.🔽Sarva tathagata abhishekayeye svaha.🔽Sarva devata abhimukha shriye ayuvalaparna keraye svaha.🔽🔽

original: sarba ba ti tva mam ga la ha sta ya sv'a h'a /🔽sim ga ba ha na ne sv'a h'a /🔽padma sam bhu ta ye sv'a h'a /🔽sarba kra ti ka khorda bi n'a sha ne sv'a h'a /
analyzed: sarba ba ti tva mam ga la ha sta ya sv'a h'a /🔽sim ga ba ha na ne sv'a h'a /🔽padma sam bhu ta ye sv'a h'a /🔽sarba kra ti ka khorda bi n'a sha ne sv'a h'a /

original: 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /
analyzed: 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /

original: gang la la lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming nyes sdig thams cad med par byed pa /
analyzed: gang la la lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming nyes sdig thams cad med par byed pa /
translated: and the name of the great goddess Śrī, which removes all evil and wrongdoing,

original: sdig pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa /
analyzed: sdig pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa /

original: bsod nams thams cad sdud par byed pa /
analyzed: bsod nams thams cad sdud par byed pa /

original: bkra mi shis pa thams cad med par byed pa /
analyzed: bkra mi shis pa thams cad med par byed pa /
translated: which removes all inauspiciousness,🔽and which gathers all glory, happiness, and good fortune.

original: dpal dang / bde ba dang / skal pa bzang po thams cad sdud par byed pa 'di dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag 'chang ba dang / klog par byed pa des nang par langs te gtsang par byas la sangs rgyas thams cad la me tog dang bdug pa gsol nas lha mo chen mo dpal la yang tsandan gyi bdug pa phul te bklags na /
analyzed: dpal dang / bde ba dang / skal pa bzang po thams cad sdud par byed pa 'di dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag 'chang ba dang / klog par byed pa des nang par langs te gtsang par byas la sangs rgyas thams cad la me tog dang bdug pa gsol nas lha mo chen mo dpal la yang tsandan gyi bdug pa phul te bklags na /
translated: If one who bears and recites these names of the Tathāgatas, having risen in the morning and purified oneself, offers flowers and incense to all the Buddhas and offers sandalwood incense to the great goddess Śrī, and recites [the names],

original: des dpal thams cad mthong bar 'gyur //
analyzed: des dpal thams cad mthong bar 'gyur //

original: bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur /
analyzed: bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur /
translated: One will obtain all happiness and mental ease.

original: lha thams @109a *//
analyzed: lha thams @109a *//

original: cad kyang srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbed pa byed par 'gyur //
analyzed: cad kyang srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbed pa byed par 'gyur //
translated: all of them will protect, guard, and conceal him.

original: de'i dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / lha mo chen mo dpal de dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang /
analyzed: de'i dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro // bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / lha mo chen mo dpal de dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang /
translated: All his needs will be fulfilled.

original: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
analyzed: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
translated: When the Blessed One had spoken thus, the bodhisattva Avalokiteśvara, the fearless one, the glorious great goddess, the entire retinue, and the world with its gods, humans, demi-gods, and gandharvas rejoiced and praised the Blessed One's words.

original: 'phags pa lha mo chen mo dpal lung bstan pa rdzogs so ////
analyzed: 'phags pa lha mo chen mo dpal lung bstan pa rdzogs so ////
translated: The prophecy of the great goddess Śrī is complete.
